[TrillionDollarWorlds.jl](https://github.com/pat-alt/TrillionDollarWords.jl) provides access to a novel financial dataset and large language model fine-tuned for classifying central bank communications as either 'hawkish', 'dovish' or 'neutral'. It ships with essential functionality for model probing, an important aspect of mechanistic interpretability.
